content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately explains an impact of Burmese pythons on the Everglades community in southern Florida using the data provided?

choices.label: Python parasitism has reduced the population of white-tailed deer and raccoons.
Python predation has caused a trophic cascade that changed the mosquitoesâ€™ niche.
Pythons have a mutual symbiosis with cotton rats, allowing their population to increase.
Intraspecific competition for food between white-tailed deer and raccoons has increased due to pythons.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
